name: Fonts.com
description: http://t.co/zdAsZ6LlMZ: Desktop Fonts, Web Fonts, and typography tools. Find your type!

apis.name: Fonts.com
apis.description: Integrate, leverage and build upon the Fonts.com Web Fonts service through a host of solutions for developers and content creators. Tap into the Fonts.com Web Fonts service to enhance your application or service. The Fonts.com Web Fonts API allows you to incorporate the functionality of the Fonts.com Web Fonts portal, enabling you to programmatically create, edit and retrieve Fonts.com Web Fonts projects and access the complete catalog of fonts.
